oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme's father told him about |xue, as !nanni's grandfather Karu had told him. !nanni talks about |xue but Tamme does not. Tamme gives his mother's father's name. 1) p.9310v: see |xe, ||namme, and the |nani, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tamme does not tell about |xue
